channel.title: Perl Weekly newsletter
channel.description: A free, once a week e-mail round-up of hand-picked news and articles about Perl.

item.title: Add and retrieve elements using jQuery + Ajax
item.description: Pert of the Dancer2 series building an Ajax-enabled application, this article shows the cliens side.

item.title: 7 myths about open sourcing your company's software
item.description: If you're championing open-source at your employer, and they're not buying it, this might provide some ammunition.

item.title: How to Write a Git Commit Message
item.description: A great post about what makes a good commit message, and why you should do this.

item.title: Call For Grant Proposals (July 2016 Round)
item.description: The next round of grant proposals are due by 15th July.

item.title: Grant extension request
item.description: 2016-07-01 Dave Mitchell is requesting another $20k for his work on Perl 5. Add your comments to the blog post, as I just did.

item.title: Test2 Manual Grant report
item.description: 2016-06-30 Chad Granum (EXODIST) has started work on his second Test2 grant.

item.title: MaxMind is looking to hire 2 Canadian Perl programmers
item.description: MaxMind are looking for two Perl programmers, but seems like they need to be in Canada.

item.title: Learning from other/experienced speakers
item.description: I want to encourage more first time speakers, particularly at LPW. As part of that I'm questions of good / experienced speakers. What question should I ask, and of whom?

item.title: 5 Things I Learned at YAPC
item.description: The recent YAPC::NA was Kivanç's first; here he shares just 5 of the things he learned. I feel he's holding back, as I'm sure Kivanç learned more than 5 things!

item.title: Retraction of Geo::Coder::Geocoder::US
item.description: Tom posted that he was going to delete Geo::Coder::Geocoder::US from CPAN, but then discussion in the comments resulted in Tom deciding to deprecate the module, and possibly delete it from CPAN at some later date.

item.title: Updating Ogg::Vorbis::Header
item.description: Dave looked into a CPAN Testers fail for one of his modules, and to fix it he ended up fixing something in someone else's module. He's not finished yet though!

item.title: Duct tape and the camel: what I've learned from maintenance
item.description: A short talk (22 minutes) from Brian at YAPC::NA, about the maintenance mindset.

item.title: How to sum data from multiple files in Perl?
item.description: Sinan takes us through a problem posed on Stack Overflow, and how he approached it.

item.title: REST API with Mojolicious
item.description: A short post from Brian, showing how you can build a simple API using Mojolicious::Lite.

item.title: P5P Mailing List Summary: June 22nd-29th
item.description: The one where we learned more about stat() calls being done when looking for modules in @INC.

item.title: NICEPERL's lists
item.description: Miguel Prz (NICEPERL)'s regular lists: Great modules released last week; MetaCPAN weekly report; StackOverflow Perl report.

item.title: #258 - Where are the YAPC::NA blog posts?
item.description:
After most conferences we usually see a flurry of blog posts. These can be helpful when deciding what talk videos to watch. There haven't been many post-YAPCNA this year.

So a request: when you go to a conference, please consider writing a blog post afterwards, even just a short one. It's helpful and interesting for those of us who can't attend. And we Perl Weekly editors appreciate it too :-)

Neil
item.dc:subject: list of tags?
